extendedInfo.description: This application calculates numerous pays for US military members (and the US Coast Guard). Base pay and BAH updated for 2013. Functionality: - Base Pay:  + Calculates base pay based on 1) Years in the Service 2) Pay Grade.   + For reservists, it calculates the estimated yearly pay based on # of drills and AT/ADT/ADSW days entered. - Incentive/Special Pays Included: + Hostile Fire Pay + Aviation Career Incentive Pay + Career Enlisted Flyer Incentive Pay + Hazardous Duty Incentive Pay (Flying) [AWACS not included at this time] + Hazardous Duty Incentive Pay (Other Than Flight)  + Diving Incentive Pay + Career Sea Pay + Special Duty Assignment Pay + Submarine Duty Incentive Pay- Allowances: + Basic Allowance for Subsistence + Family Separation Allowance + Basic Allowance for Housing  + CONUS COLA + OCONUS COLA (**-See below notes on OCONUS COLA/OHA) + Overseas Housing Allowance (**-See below notes on OCONUS COLA/OHA) + Personal Money Allowance- Medical Officer Pays: + Includes all pays from DoD Financial Management Regulation Volume 7A, Chapter 5- User can email the results to save this information for later use [Incentive/medical pays not included at this time]. ** BAH for Reservists: - BAH is calculated based on your zip code and is not "BAH RC/T" which is the type of BAH applicable for active duty periods under 30 days. Â See (http://www.defensetravel.dod.mil/Docs/perdiem/browse/Allowances/Non-Locality_BAH/2013-Non-Locality-BAH-Rates.pdf).*** OCONUS COLA/OHA:- Actual OCONUS COLA received is based on the # of days in the month being paid, so it varies slightly per month.- Some OCONUS COLA and OHA location data is updated monthly by the DTMO, and this app will not be updated each time.  On each app update for other reasons, the lastest OCONUS COLA and OHA data will be incorporated.As always, feedback on suggested improvements or possible issues are greatly appreciated.

reviews.title: Good Database
reviews.comment: Great app for military members..especially NCOs who have troops with questions about their pay!   Would be nice if it had a OCONUS COLA database though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: This is short and simple. Exactly what was needed.
reviews.author: Peter Doblar

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Really nice calc. Need to add HDP-L(Hardship Duty Pay). Really surprised its not there as it is very common deployed entitlement, much like HFP.  Finance NCOIC 88th RSC SRP Team
reviews.author: nathan siebach

reviews.comment: Best pay app out there!
reviews.author: Chris Cawrse

reviews.title: Good program
reviews.comment: Needs pharmacy special pay
reviews.author: 0083rockman

reviews.title: Very Accurate
reviews.comment: I love this app. I like to budget and this app helps me by providing both base pay  and allowances.
reviews.author: AVA THOMPSON

reviews.comment: Great app
reviews.author: Brian Laney

reviews.title: Pretty handy
reviews.comment: Needs to include the special duty pay for drill and recruiting
reviews.author: Franklin Stonom

reviews.title: Nice! Very accurate!
reviews.comment: Love the app, it calculates military pay very quickly. I would like to see a retirement calculator as well for the paid version. Good work.
reviews.author: Rob Bateman

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: Great app for planning.  Can guess your paycheck down to the cent.  Good for deployments and pcs.  Needs to include demolition pay, SDIP, travel (per diem,etc.) and even a bonus calculator with current zone multipliers would be helpful. (AF)  Update as of 27Jul 2013  App crashes when trying to access the incentives screen on Google nexus tablet.
reviews.author: Eric Templeton

reviews.title: Straight forward and user friendly.
reviews.comment: Nice app for determining our pay.
reviews.author: Joseph Roberts

reviews.title: Note 2 user
reviews.comment: Great app. Precise calculations.
reviews.author: L. Aikens

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: If your military, this is the app to have.
reviews.author: Kevin Charles

reviews.title: Helper
reviews.comment: Great app!
reviews.author: Kersten Louise Golightly

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Helps alot with pay breakdown!
reviews.author: Kellan Mills

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Detailed, current, and accurate information, highly recommended app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Huh?
reviews.comment: Why not 99 cents or free...?
reviews.author: Robert Hattan

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Super easy to use! Just wish SDAP (Drill Sergeant, Recruiter, Special Operations, etc...) feature gets added.
reviews.author: Romeo Estrella

reviews.title: Not bad at all.....
reviews.comment: A very useful tool especially if you get stationed in different parts of the world. An SDAP option added to the special pays is the only thing the only thing stopping this app from being perfect.
reviews.author: Jesse Hamilton

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I love this app but in the next update I\'d like to see special duty pay. $450 a month recruiter and drill pay
reviews.author: Stephen Wallace
